meanings.sent1: The signeted letter was proof of its authenticity.
meanings.sent2: The signeted ring belonged to the king.
meanings.sent3: The signeted document was so official, it made me feel important.
meanings.sent4: Her signeted necklace held sentimental value beyond measure.
meanings.sent5: The signeted crest on the shield gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Marked with a signet or seal
meanings.sent1: The signeted envelope contained a surprise invitation.
meanings.sent2: The signeted parchment bore the mark of the royal family.
meanings.sent3: The signeted package looked like a secret treasure.
meanings.sent4: His signeted signature on the letter gave it an air of importance.
meanings.sent5: The signeted wax seal on the scroll was unbroken and mysterious.

meanings.sent1: The signeted book was a rare find in the library.
meanings.sent2: The signeted sword was passed down through generations.
meanings.sent3: The signeted door knocker seemed to guard the entrance.
meanings.sent4: His signeted family crest was proudly displayed on the shield.
meanings.sent5: The signeted locket held a precious memory close to her heart.
